subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez, who had two hits in his previous 23 times at bat, punched a single to center field off the Devil Rays' Ruddy Lugo, and that was enough to bring home Johnny Damon with the winning run.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez, who had two hits in his previous 23 times at bat, punched a single to center field off the Devil Rays' Ruddy Lugo, and that was enough to bring home Johnny Damon with the winning run.
